title: Our Future Home
description: A soft, sunlit home that feels like a secret world just for us — warm wooden floors, gentle morning light on the walls, and the quiet comfort of knowing we wake up next to each other every day.

title: London Adventures
description: Foggy streets, city lights, and us walking hand in hand along the river — coffee in one hand, your hand in the other, as we explore London like it was always waiting for us.

title: Christmas Together
description: Soft fairy lights, warm blankets, hot chocolate, and the quiet magic of our first real Christmas together — the kind where the best gift is simply being in the same room, breathing the same cozy air.

title: Roses For You
description: A gentle bouquet of roses that will always look a little bit like you — soft, delicate, and quietly powerful, carrying a promise that I will keep choosing you, day after day.

title: Pink Rabbit & Blue Fairy Boy
description: Our little fairytale — a pink rabbit girl and a blue fairy boy, meeting under a soft glowing tree in a world that exists only for them, where every hop and flutter says: ‘I’m here, I’m yours.’

title: Marriage & Rings
description: Two rings, one quiet ‘yes’, and a lifetime in between — the moment when the world softens and it’s just us, promising to be each other’s safest place, in every version of the future.

title: Cozy Evenings With You
description: Dim lights, shared blankets, whispered jokes, and the kind of silence that feels full instead of empty — evenings where time slows down and the only plan is to be close to you.

title: Our 2025 / 2026 Dreams
description: All the things we’re building together — degrees, careers, countries, and quiet little rituals — a map of our dreams for 2025 and 2026, with a small note in the corner that says: ‘We did this together.’
